rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Invidian Drivers are pretty much the
same as any other Drivers.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0002
rows.name:
We use Core Crystals that have been
cleansed over in Acedia.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0003
rows.name:
That's what I did. There's still a lot
of people who can't resonate with
the raw crystals, you see.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But if you really want to pack a punch
on the battlefield, you've gotta be a
Driver.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0005
rows.name:
That's how it is here, and everywhere
else.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0006
rows.name:
So we don't have much choice but to
rely on Acedia for cleansing.

rows.label: tlk43320341_03_msg0007
rows.name:
And this is the source of
Acedia's mighty strength!
